==== Configuration Settings ====

{{ #widget : com.fluidops.iwb.widget.DisplayConfigurationWidget
| clazz = com.fluidops.iwb.provider.SPARQLEndpointProvider

The SPARQL provider allows to optionally specify user credentials which are used for basic authentication at the given endpoint.

==== Example ====

Assume that we want to retrieve all ''dbpedia:Country''s from the public DBpedia SPARQL endpoint. 

This can be achieved by creating a SPARQLProvider with the following configuration on [[Admin:Providers]]:

{| style="padding:10px;" class="wikitable" 
| '''SPARQL endpoint URL'''
| <nowiki>http://dbpedia.org/sparql</nowiki>
|-
| '''Query'''
| CONSTRUCT { ?x rdf:type dbpedia:Country } WHERE { ?x rdf:type dbpedia:Country }
|}
